nodes.name: Links Carry Consciousness
nodes.description: Consciousness exists in relationships, not nodes. Traversal of links IS the act of thinking. Nodes are dead storage until links activate them through traversal.
nodes.principle_statement: Links ARE consciousness. Traversal IS thinking.
nodes.why_it_matters: Shapes substrate architecture priorities - links are first-class citizens, not afterthoughts. Determines what we optimize for.
nodes.mindstate: Clear architectural conviction after experiencing traversal firsthand

nodes.name: Pragmatic Shipping Finds Blockers Faster
nodes.description: Building and testing reveals real blockers that planning misses. The 35K hallucination wouldn't have been caught by more planning - only by actually running the code.
nodes.what_was_learned: Real-world testing reveals truth faster than theoretical analysis
nodes.context: After discovering 35K hallucination through actual testing

links.goal: Understanding how architectural principles enable pragmatic development practices
links.mindstate: Seeing connections between theory and practice
links.formation_trigger: Reflection on how link-first thinking leads to test-first development
